name: Revolution (itch) (dunstad)
description:
★★★ KNOWN ISSUE: Your pawns can ONLY be selected by clicking on the space they ORIGINALLY START in, even after they move. Sorry about that! The game is winnable if you work around it, good luck!

Also, be sure to fullscreen the web version so buttons are visible. Thanks!

★★★★★★★★★★
CONTROLS: Click on a pawn to select it!

Click Move or Attack, THEN Click an outlined square to make the character act!

The dice determine what actions you can take in a turn.
 if you roll no moves you can't move that turn!

Die faces: Swords are Attack, Feathers are Move.

★★★★★★★★★★
